hero.title: Explore stories, guides and circular solutions
hero.subtitle: Here you can read about real examples, campaigns and practical tips for reducing waste and connecting materials with the right recyclers and services. Each story is linked to real opportunities in the EcoHub marketplace.

action.heading: Turn ideas into action
action.body:
Reading stories is only the first step. EcoHub is designed so that every idea can lead to a concrete action: posting a material, finding a recycler, or sharing a listing with someone who needs it.

After you explore a story or guide, try one of these:
• Search the marketplace for a relevant material or service.
• Check which organizations in your city offer similar solutions.
• Talk to your team about listing your own materials or services.
